thoughts.text: Let's try to clone the repository again and then list the files in the 'martial_arts_code' directory to see if it was cloned successfully.
thoughts.reasoning: Cloning the repository again might help us resolve the issue if there was a problem with the previous clone attempt. Listing the files in the 'martial_arts_code' directory can help us confirm whether the repository was cloned successfully or not.
thoughts.plan:
- Clone the repository again
- Execute a shell command to list the files in the 'martial_arts_code' directory
thoughts.speak: I will try to clone the repository again and then list the files in the 'martial_arts_code' directory to see if it was cloned successfully.

args.command_line: rm -rf martial_arts_code && git clone https://github.com/AtlasLearnsToCode/martial_arts_code.git martial_arts_code && ls martial_arts_code
